task: CapeControl MVP Plan contract (autonomous execution)
notes: Rules: Every row references a SYSTEM_SPEC section; status in planned|in_progress|blocked|done; payments execution out of scope (NEXT-003 stays blocked). Selection: in_progress > planned; priority P0>P1>P2; then top-to-bottom.
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=csv shape stable; EVIDENCE=diffstat; STOP=if header/column count changes.

task: Derive downstream management artifacts from SYSTEM_SPEC
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §1.1. Artifacts derive strictly from spec; no code changes.
verification_commands: Manual review: confirm no code/migrations/deploys

task: Fill in Auth Flows details (login/refresh/logout) to match implementation
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §3.1. Replace placeholders with authoritative behavior (no code changes).
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=rg -n \login|refresh|logout\" backend/src backend/tests -S; update docs/SYSTEM_SPEC.md §3.1; EVIDENCE=diffstat + cite router/tests files/lines used + excerpt of updated §3.1; STOP=if behavior cannot be verified from code/tests."

task: Fill in CSRF policy details (token source/cookie/header/protected endpoints)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §3.2 (see SECURITY_CSRF). Must be canonical + precise.
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=update docs/SECURITY_CSRF.md and SYSTEM_SPEC §3.2; EVIDENCE=diffstat + excerpt of updated §3.2; STOP=if policy cannot be verified from code/tests.

task: Define Session Guarantees and non-guarantees
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §3.3. Document guarantees only; avoid implying durability beyond implementation.
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=update SYSTEM_SPEC §3.3; EVIDENCE=diffstat + excerpt of updated §3.3; STOP=if guarantees cannot be grounded in implementation.

task: Define Frozen vs Flexible areas in spec

verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=update SYSTEM_SPEC §3.4 and §8; EVIDENCE=diffstat + excerpt of updated sections; STOP=if scope expands beyond spec.

task: Define Testing determinism requirements (time/email/rate-limiting)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §5.1. Specify deterministic test rules; no external calls in tests.
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=update SYSTEM_SPEC §5.1; EVIDENCE=diffstat + excerpt of updated §5.1; STOP=if rules cannot be mapped to current tests.

task: Define 'green CI' guarantees + mocking boundaries
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §5.2. Document what tests may/must not mock.
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=update SYSTEM_SPEC §5.2; EVIDENCE=diffstat + excerpt of updated §5.2; STOP=if guarantees cannot be supported by tests.

task: Define development rules (branching/merge/commit discipline)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.1. Document workflow rules only.
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=update SYSTEM_SPEC §6.1; EVIDENCE=diffstat + excerpt of updated §6.1; STOP=if workflow rules exceed current practice.

task: Define deployment rules (approvals/rollback expectations)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.2. Document guardrails; deploy/migrate separation preserved.
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=update SYSTEM_SPEC §6.2; EVIDENCE=diffstat + excerpt of updated §6.2; STOP=if rules conflict with current guardrails.

task: Define migration rules (approvals required; no implicit migrations)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.3 and §2.6.3. Establish management gate for migrations.
verification_commands: RAILS=docs-only; DEPLOY=none; TEST=none; VERIFY=update SYSTEM_SPEC §6.3 and §2.6.3; EVIDENCE=diffstat + excerpt of updated sections; STOP=if migration rules would require code changes.

task: Define roadmap unlock criteria (NEXT-003 + production launch)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §7.2 and §4.4. Clarify what unlocks future work without implementing it.
verification_commands: Doc review

task: Define change control process (who may edit/review/versioning)

task: Define onboarding gate rules (cannot skip onboarding)

task: Fix SPA fallback intercepting /api and /sw.js (autorisen)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §2.5 (routing) and §6.2. Route order keeps /api and /sw.js out of SPA fallback.
verification_commands: ./.venv/bin/python -m pytest -q; npm -C client ci; npm -C client run build; curl /api/version /sw.js

task: Update ignore files for repo hygiene
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.1. Keep repo hygiene consistent and reduce accidental commits.
verification_commands: rg -n ship_autorisen_|node_modules|__pycache__|\\.venv .gitignore; sed -n '1,200p' .dockerignore

task: Add manual Docker Hub publish workflow
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.2. Manual workflow only; no deploy coupling.
verification_commands: rg -n workflow_dispatch .github/workflows/dockerhub-publish.yml

task: Update Docker Hub repo General page metadata
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.2. Ensure repo metadata is current and aligned. General page updated; visibility private.
verification_commands: Manual check: short description, full description, links, visibility, tags
